text: Amanage huno Mikozama Kegavama Hu'nea Ra Anumzamo'a Tairi vahe'motagura hie, Kagrama traka'ma hana agasasane, ahe kuzafa'ma antesia vahe'mo'zama kragi'ma ranaza zane, bainati kazinteti'ma zamahesia zamofo agasasama ra hagerinkenama me'nea mopafi vahe'mo'za antahisu'za zmahirahiku nehu'za koro hugahaze.
